question:
Question: Navigation Instruction given at initial position: [take off and turn left and move forward and go over the building and and turn left and little move forward and turn right and move forward and get down at intersection road and turn right at tree and fly up and move forward. now get down at intersection road and turn left and move forward and our back and fly up and move forward and go over the building and road. now get down front of the pink building and turn back and your see daves car wash building and fly up and move forward and go over the building. now move towards the american board of the building and turn left and fly up and move forward. now get down beside white building and move forward and go over the road and turn left and forward and turn right and move forward and landed at front of american board of the building.]. At the initial position, you are asked to navigate according to a series of movement instructions. When you reach the current location, what is the Landmark Position to the building's US board?  
choose:  
A. I am located to the right of the American Commission building.  
B. I am located in front of the American Council building.  
C. I am far away from the building.  
D. I am located behind the American Council building.  
E. I am located to the left of the American Commission building.

textgrad_result.init_answer: Option: B; Reason: The navigation instructions lead to a final position in front of the American Board building, as indicated by the last part of the instructions: "landed at front of american board of the building." This matches option B, which states that you are in front of the American Council building.
textgrad_result.evaluation:
Location: [(0, 32)]
Option: B
Reason: The navigation instructions end with "landed at front of american board of the building", so the final position is in front of the American Council building.
textgrad_result.final_answer: Option: B; Reason: The navigation instructions lead to a final position in front of the American Board building, as indicated by the last part of the instructions: "landed at front of american board of the building." This matches option B, which states that you are in front of the American Council building.
